docs.snippet: The Yankees hope to piece together replacements for Robinson Cano at second base and Alex Rodriguez at third. The player they are counting on most is the former Oriole Brian Roberts....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Yankees hope to piece together replacements for Robinson Cano at second base and Alex Rodriguez at third. The player they are counting on most is the former Oriole Brian Roberts.
docs.abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column examines New York Yankees' effort to fill positions for Robinson Cano at second base and Alex Rodriguez at third; notes that team will rely heavily on Brian Roberts, excellent player who has missed 450 games in the last four seasons due to injury.

headline.main: With Roberts, Yanks Hope Imperfect Piece Is Good Fit
headline.print_headline: With Roberts, Yanks Hope Imperfect Piece Is Good Fit

docs.snippet: Zack Wheeler, a 23-year-old right-hander, will try to further establish himself in his first full major league season as one of the Mets’ top power pitchers....
docs.lead_paragraph: Zack Wheeler, a 23-year-old right-hander, will try to further establish himself in his first full major league season as one of the Mets’ top power pitchers.
docs.abstract: New York Mets pitcher Zack Wheeler, putting in a strong spring training performance, will try to establish himself early in his first full season with the team; Wheeler will be team's only power pitcher until Noah Syndergaard and Matt Harvey are called up later in season.

headline.main: Wheeler’s Potential Is on Display in His First Spring Start
headline.print_headline: Wheeler’s Potential Is on Display in Spring Debut

docs.snippet: The senior Javi Salas pitched a perfect game as Miami routed Villanova, 17-0. Salas, drafted in the 38th round by Minnesota last year, faced only four three-ball counts....
docs.lead_paragraph: The senior Javi Salas pitched a perfect game as Miami routed Villanova, 17-0. Salas, drafted in the 38th round by Minnesota last year, faced only four three-ball counts.
docs.abstract: University of Miami baseball team beats Villanova, 17-0, as senior Javi Salas pitches a perfect game.

docs.snippet: Royals reliever Luke Hochevar has been shut down due to a sprained ligament in his pitching elbow and could miss the first two months of the Major League Baseball season, the Kansas City Star reported on Wednesday....

docs.snippet: Martin Brodeur stopped 20 shots in a win over Detroit in the Devils’ last game before Wednesday’s trade deadline, when they could try to move Brodeur, their longtime star who has become an occasional backup....
docs.lead_paragraph: Martin Brodeur stopped 20 shots in a win over Detroit in the Devils’ last game before Wednesday’s trade deadline, when they could try to move Brodeur, their longtime star who has become an occasional backup.
docs.abstract: New Jersey Devils beat Detroit Red Wings, 4-3, as goalie Martin Brodeur puts in stellar performance during what could be his last game with Devils before trade deadline.

headline.main: Brodeur Earns Win in What May Be His Devils Finale
headline.print_headline: Brodeur Earns Win in What May Be His Devils Finale

docs.snippet: The Weather Channel is adding a morning news show called “AMHQ With Sam Champion,” a program that advertisers suggested the company create to give the network regularly scheduled programming....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Weather Channel is adding a morning news show called “AMHQ With Sam Champion,” a program that advertisers suggested the company create to give the network regularly scheduled programming.
docs.abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column notes Weather Channel has created a morning news show called AMHQ With Sam Champion as it rolls out more regularly scheduled programming at the behest of advertisers.
